message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good return on my investment. What do you think?

I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but I'm still not convinced that $110 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100, which is the price I was initially interested in. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you consider it?
